name: Xenochamber
description: Xenochamber is a platformer with a paradoxical storyline. You play as Jill who is searching for her father in an unexplored planetary system.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10  32/64 Processor: Intel Dual Core 2.4 GHZ -  i7 3930K 6 Core  x 3.06 GHZ / AMD Dual Core 2.6 GHZ - FX8150 8 Core x 3.6 GHZ Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® 8600 GT 512MB VRAM – NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 680 2GB VRAM / Radeon HD 3400 512MB VRAM - Radeon HD 7970 3GB VRAM Storage: 305 MB available space
